title: Untitled [fantastic man and woman in profile]
marks:
Inscription

LRC, on back, in pencil: [25]
description: line drawing of standing fantastic man and woman in profile; elf-like man at left wearing cap and scarf, gesturing with his two index fingers; old woman at right with very large ears and small face; slightly hunched posture; woman wears a shawl and leans on a crooked cane
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
